about_the_game:
Virtuverse is a Sci-Fi RCE MMORPG. It integrates an intuitive economy system with action-based third-person gameplay. Unlike many other MMOs, Virtuverse does not have any class restrictions, so you can use any weapon or armour you wish. An immersive story will lead players to discover new lands and planets, and those who wish to seek their own adventures will be able to explore Virtuverse on their own or with friends.

In Virtuverse's economy, everything after the starting equipment is created or looted by players. An organic market with ever-shifting supply and demand will keep every player on their toes, and create opportunity for profit.

Explore:


Explore Temrance Island, the mainland of Planet Stig and beyond! Virtuverse offers a huge variety of biomes to explore and colonise though it's evolving storyline.
Venture into the wilds to make a name for yourself as you explore ancient and alien ruins.

Hunt:


Virtuverse hosts a huge variety of creatures and other threats to your survival - use a wide assortment of weapons and tools to decimate them and take the spoils.

Craft:


With over 13 different crafting professions, each with their own progression tree, find a niche for yourself as a crafter within Planet Stig.

Build:


Virtuverse offers both instanced, and in-world, housing and plots to build on. Either make a home to relax and store your hard-gained resources, or run a business and capitalize on the needs of other players.

Virtuverse Coming to Unreal Engine 5

In June of 2021, a few months into the development of Alpha 6, we started playing around in Unreal 5. At this point, porting, let alone a complete rewrite, was just a faint dream in our minds. Today we’re excited to announce that this will become a reality — Virtuverse Alpha 7 will be using the latest Unreal Engine 5.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i3 3240 at 3.2GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 (2GB) or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
